Description: Job Profile:— Execution of business plan to deliver revenue projections— Negotiate lucrative deals with related stakeholders to offer unparalleled value to customers— Meet with clients and actively promote personalized packages— Canvas to prospective clients to promote corporate travel plans— Continuously develop communication material to remain relevant to clients requirements.— Coaching and developing the teamSkills
Skills: — Minimum 4 years in the travel and leisure industry in Dubai/UAE with at least 2 years in a similar capacity
— Sound knowledge of travel, leisure and hospitality products (packages) and pricing
— Proven track record of developing, executing and managing inbound & outbound travel itineraries and having handled difficult customers
— Strong leadership and management skills, with ability to inspire and lead others
— Excellent language skills in English, while fluency in Arabic and/or Hindi, Malayalam will be to the candidate’s advantage
— Good working knowledge and practice in Microsoft Office applications in a fully systematic environment

Data.Company Industry: Tourism, Museum, & Cultural; Travel Agency; Marketing
